DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect rebound exercise ( mini trampoline jumping ) metabolic outcomes quality life patient Type 2 Diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Rebound Exercise Individuals With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The exercise involve jump mini trampoline foot slightly apart . Participants stand mid portion trampoline bed make repeat up-and-down bouncy movement . Each foot strike equal one step bounce . With landing , mat trampoline underwent deformation spring release energy store participant make bounce mat . Exercise administer 10 - 15 minute 5-minute period rest allow . A heart rate monitor use guide intensity exercise moderate range . Each participant accumulate 20 30 minute rebound exercise ( bounce mini trampoline ) per session , administer three time per week 12 week . All data capture baseline end 12-week intervention period .
DOC.criteria: 30 60yearold male female individual ; A diagnosis type 2 diabetes â‰¤ 5 year ; Attendance Diabetes Outpatient Clinics Aminu Kano Teaching Hospital Murtala Muhammad Specialist Hospital Kano , Northwestern Nigeria ; Selfambulatory ; An inactive lifestyle last year . A diagnosis type 2 diabetes 5 year ; Hypertension ( systolic diastolic blood pressure 140 90 mmHg , respectively ) treatment hypertension ; Use insulin therapy Lower limb weakness and/or deformity loss protective sensation foot ; Back , shoulder knee problem and/or joint instability ; History coronary artery disease , retinopathy nephropathy ; Myocardial infarction , cardiac abdominal surgery within previous 6 month ; History fracture spine , hip , knee and/or ankle joint .
